name: spacewars (ohton_the_knight)
description:
this is my first game there are many like it but this one is mine

controls

player1 (w) to move forward (a) to move left (d) to move right (e) to shoot (q) to shoot bombs

player 2 (uparrow) to move forward (leftarrow) to move left (rightarrow) to move right (/) to shoot (shift) to shoot bombs
